Text:
Couldn't get this to work for my PS3. Tried mkv2vob, plus others, demuxed-remuxed, no luck.

YMMV but just a warning.

Note: Worked fine on PC with VLC player.
At 1:45 German not translated, all you get is Line 435, Line 436 etc, also Russian to English not translated, Line 525, Line 526 etc spoilt what was going on for me in parts.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1321865/
this torrent isnt the 330min version
